import React from 'react' import {AppContext} from '../../App' const Item = (props) => { const context = React.createContext(AppContext) const [favorite, setFavorite] = React.useState(false); const [cart, setCart] = React.useState(context.isCart) const onClickBasket=() => { setCart(!cart) let id = props.id let myId = props.myId let title = props.title let description = props.description let price = props.price let img = props.img props.favoritesBtn({title, description, price, img, id, myId}) } const onClickFavorites=() => { setFavorite(!favorite) let id = props.id let myId = props.myId let title = props.title let description = props.description let price = props.price let img = props.img props.favoritesBtn({title, description, price, img, id, myId}) } return (
{ context.isCart(props.myId) == true ? : }

{props.title}

{props.description}

{props.price}

) } export default Item
